Bash("C:/Users/BASH/miniconda3/python.exe" -c "
# Test the key API differences  
from OCP.BRepGProp import BRepGProp
from OCP.GProp import GProp_GProps
from OCP.BRep import BRep_Tool
from OCP.TopExp import TopExp

# In OCC: brepgprop.SurfaceProperties\(shape, props\)
# In OCP: BRepGProp.SurfaceProperties_s\(shape, props\)
print\(''BRepGProp static methods:'', [x for x in dir\(BRepGProp\) if x.endswith\(''_s''\)]\)

# In OCC: topexp.MapShapesAndAncestors\(...\)
# In OCP: TopExp.MapShapesAndAncestors_s\(...\)
print\(''TopExp static methods:'', [x for x in dir\(TopExp\) if x.endswith\(''_s''\)]\)

# In OCC: BRep_Tool.Range\(edge\) returns \(first, last\) 
# In OCP: BRep_Tool.Range_s\(edge\) 
print\(''BRep_Tool static methods:'', [x for x in dir\(BRep_Tool\) if x.endswith\(''_s''\)]\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/BASH/miniconda3/python.exe" -c "
# Check if face-level tessellation is possible via OCP directly
from OCP.STEPControl import STEPControl_Reader
from OCP.IFSelect import IFSelect_RetDone
from OCP.BRepMesh import BRepMesh_IncrementalMesh
from OCP.TopExp import TopExp_Explorer
from OCP.TopAbs import TopAbs_FACE
from OCP.BRep import BRep_Tool
from OCP.TopLoc import TopLoc_Location

reader = STEPControl_Reader\(\)
status = reader.ReadFile\(''C:/Users/BASH/Desktop/Antigravity/vectismachining/geometry-service/tests/fixtures/FreeCAD_Beginner_163-Body.step''\)
print\(''Read status:'', status\)
reader.TransferRoots\(\)
shape = reader.OneShape\(\)
print\(''Shape type:'', type\(shape\)\)

# Tessellate
mesh = BRepMesh_IncrementalMesh\(shape, 0.1, False, 12.0, True\)
mesh.Perform\(\)
print\(''Mesh done:'', mesh.IsDone\(\)\)

# Count faces
exp = TopExp_Explorer\(shape, TopAbs_FACE\)
count = 0
while exp.More\(\):
    count += 1
    exp.Next\(\)
print\(''Face count:'', count\)

# Get triangulation for first face
exp2 = TopExp_Explorer\(shape, TopAbs_FACE\)
face = exp2.Current\(\)
loc = TopLoc_Location\(\)
tri = BRep_Tool.Triangulation_s\(face, loc\)
print\(''Triangulation:'', type\(tri\)\)
if tri:
    print\(''Nodes:'', tri.NbNodes\(\), ''Triangles:'', tri.NbTriangles\(\)\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/BASH/miniconda3/python.exe" -c "
# Test OCP brepgprop static method pattern
from OCP.GProp import GProp_GProps
from OCP.BRepGProp import BRepGProp
from OCP.STEPControl import STEPControl_Reader
from OCP.TopExp import TopExp_Explorer
from OCP.TopAbs import TopAbs_FACE
from OCP.TopoDS import TopoDS

reader = STEPControl_Reader\(\)
reader.ReadFile\(''C:/Users/BASH/Desktop/Antigravity/vectismachining/geometry-service/tests/fixtures/FreeCAD_Beginner_163-Body.step''\)
reader.TransferRoots\(\)
shape = reader.OneShape\(\)

exp = TopExp_Explorer\(shape, TopAbs_FACE\)
face = TopoDS.Face_s\(exp.Current\(\)\)

props = GProp_GProps\(\)
BRepGProp.SurfaceProperties_s\(face, props\)
print\(''Area:'', props.Mass\(\)\)
center = props.CentreOfMass\(\)
print\(''Center:'', center.X\(\), center.Y\(\), center.Z\(\)\)
")
